backend.src.app.repositories.clients package

Submodules

backend.src.app.repositories.clients.client_repository module

class backend.src.app.repositories.clients.client_repository.ClientRepository(client_id=None, client_email=None)[source]

Bases: object

The ClientRepository class encapsulates the logic necessary to access the database and perform CRUD operations on the Client model.

Variables:

  • client_id – Unique identifier of the client.

  • client_email – Email of the client.

  • client – Instance of Client model. Default is None.

delete()[source]

Delete the current client instance from the database.

get_client()[source]

Retrieve the current client instance.

Returns:

Returns the current client instance or None if it doesn’t exist.

Return type:

Client or None

get_client_all_data()[source]

Retrieve all data of the current client instance.

Returns:

Returns a dictionary containing all data of the current client instance. Contains following keys: - id (int): The client’s ID. - name (str): The client’s name. - surname (str): The client’s surname. - email (str): The client’s email. - phone (str): The client’s phone. - passport_number (str): The client’s passport_number. - address (str): The client’s address. - birth_date (datetime.date): The client’s birthdate. - registration_date (datetime.date): The client’s registration date.

Return type:

dict[str, any]

update(update_data)[source]

Update the current client instance based on the provided update data.

Parameters:

update_data (dict[str, any]) – Dictionary containing new values for the client’s attributes.

Returns:

Returns True if the update was successful, False otherwise.

Return type:

bool

backend.src.app.repositories.clients.clients_repository module

class backend.src.app.repositories.clients.clients_repository.ClientsRepository(create_data=None)[source]

Bases: object

The ClientsRepository class provides methods for creating, retrieving, and sorting Client objects.

This class acts as a repository and uses the Client model to perform operations related to clients.

create()[source]

Creates a Client instance.

This method takes the client data provided during the initialization of the repository, validates it, and if valid, creates a Client instance.

Returns:

True if the client was created, False otherwise.

Return type:

bool

get_all()[source]

Retrieves all Client instances.

This method fetches all the Client instances from the database and stores the result.

Returns:

A list of all Client instances.

Return type:

list[Client]

sort_all(sort_data)[source]

Sorts all Client instances based on the provided sorting parameters and stores the result.

Parameters:

sort_data (dict[str, any]) – Dictionary containing the sorting parameters.

Returns:

A sorted list of all Client instances if the sorting parameters are valid, None otherwise.

Return type:

list[Client] or None
